message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do better than $9000, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9500?
